Maternity	hand-held	record	(MHHR)/ENCOMPASS	Digital	Record
ENCOMPASS is a new electronic 
patient record system for 
Northern Ireland which has 
‘gone live’ in the South Eastern 
Health and Social Care Trust on 
9 November 2023, with all other 
Trusts moving to digital records 
by 2025.
This means depending on 
what trust you book in you may 
have a digital health record or 
Maternity Hand Held Record 
(Green notes) or a combination 
of both during this time.
